data.message: Eminem, anti-republican, pro democrat dip 💩wrappin' bout hoes and bitches, raping 'em .... hopefully it ain't your mom, wife, hoe, or daughter that gets raped. Way to glorify being a douchebag 👍👏 Thug ? More like bitch ass punk 🐈

replies.message: He didn't say that he does it though, it's just a song. Words. Just chill bro
lol dumbass you are giving him the exact response that he wants, you lose

You got mad because he said Trump's a bitch?
Its a song get over it.

JASON CHAPMAN,
HAS IT OCCURRED TO YOU THAT THIS ELECTION HAD NOTHING TO DO WITH WHETHER OR NOT SOMEONE WAS PRO REPUBLICAN OR PRO DEMOCRAT...IT MOSTLY HAD TO DO WITH WHETHER OR NOT YOU HAD MORALS, EXPERIENCE, AND A WILLINGNESS TO FIGHT FOR WHAT'S RIGHT...THATS A TRUE AMERICAN PRESIDENT, WHICH MOST AMERICANS DIDN'T VOTE FOR. AND FYI WE ALL KNOW YOU KNOW NOTHING ABOUT EM TO BE BITCHING ABOUT HOW, WHAT, AND WHY HE RAPS ABOUT THINGS HE DOES...SO THE ONLY PUSSY ASS DOUCHEBAG I SEE IS YOU!
